fullplot: Paris today. Simon works as psychologist in human resources department of petrochemical corporation. When Management gets him to investigate one of the factory's executives, Simon'perception goes disturbingly chaotic and cloudy. The experience affects his body, his mind, his personal life and his sensibility. The calm assurance that made him such a rigorous technician starts to falter.
plot: A psychologist discovers troubling links between Nazism and modern-day big business.
title: Heartbeat Detector

tomatoes.consensus: Gripping and provocative psychological thriller about corporate responsibility remains tense throughout and despite its long running time.
